SEARCH

Interface UserActions

All Known Implementing Classes:
Admin, CampCommittee, Staff, Student, User
public interface UserActions
The UserActions provides an abstract for all required action for the User class This includes changing password, logging in, logging out, and getting each attribute.

  • Method Details

    • changePassword

      void changePassword(String newPassword) throws UserException
      Changes the user's password to the specified new password.
      Parameters:
      newPassword - The new password to set.
      Throws:
      UserException - If an error occurs during the password change process.

    • login

      boolean login(String password) throws UserException
      Authenticates the user by verifying the provided password.
      Parameters:
      password - The provided password to verify.
      Returns:
      true if the login is successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      UserException - If an error occurs during the login process.

    • logout

      void logout() throws UserException
      Logs the user out of the system.
      Throws:
      UserException - If an error occurs during the logout process.

    • getEmail

      String getEmail()
      Retrieves the email of the user.
      Returns:
      The user's email.

    • getUserID

      String getUserID()
      Retrieves the ID of the user.
      Returns:
      The user's ID.

    • getFaculty

      String getFaculty()
      Retrieves the faculty of the user.
      Returns:
      The user's faculty information.

    • isLocked

      boolean isLocked()
      Retrieves if the account is locked.
      Returns:
      true if the account is locked, false otherwise.

      String getPassword()
      Retrieves the password of the user.
